original_text: God knows that I very much want to be with all of you. I love you very much, just like Christ Jesus himself loves you.
korean_text: 내가 예수 그리스도의 심장으로 너희 무리를 얼마나 사모하는지 하나님이 내 증인이시니라

sentences.original_text: that I very much want to be with all of you
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 모두와 함께 있기를 매원 간절히 원한다는 것을

sentences.original_text: just like Christ Jesus himself loves you
sentences.korean_translation: 그리스도 예수님께서 친히 여러분을 사랑하시는 것처럼
